SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT M.* , months_between ( add_months(M.check_date,s.DETECTION_PERIOD*12), sysdate ) as num FROM meters M LEFT JOIN SYS_CHECK_METER s ON s.CALIBER = M.CALIBER LEFT JOIN LOCATION_METER LM ON M.ID = LM.METER_ID
( ( SELECT sysdate FROM DUAL ) > trunc ( add_months ( M.check_date, ( 12 * ( SELECT DETECTION_PERIOD FROM SYS_CHECK_METER b WHERE b.CALIBER = M.CALIBER ) ) - 2 ), 'DD' ) )
AND M.DELETED=0 AND LM.DELETED=0
AND LM.TRACE_IDS LIKE CONCAT(#{traceIds}, '%')
AND ( M.METER_NO LIKE concat(concat('%',#{searchCond}),'%') OR M.PLACE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{searchCond}),'%') OR M.FACTORY LIKE concat(concat('%',#{searchCond}),'%') )
AND M.CALIBER=#{caliber}
) T
( T.num >=0 and T.num < 1)
AND ( T.num >=1 and T.num <= 2)
AND T.num <0
ORDER BY T.CHECK_DATE DESC
